channel.title: Rune-Hive 718/753 ECO, Drygores, Kalphite, Tetsu
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]Rune-Hive 718/753[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Rune-Hive is a RuneScape Private Server with one goal in mind. Do whatever it takes to keep the players happy.
Here at Rune-Hive we strive to make your experience with us one of a kind.
Join the community [url=http://Rune-Hive.enjin.com]Rune-Hive.enjin.com[/url]
or download the client directly here
[url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/3ff3efd5x4eqh41/Rune-Hive.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAFC_Uj4VcX-QIucVxqzq3dDxgBLfMAruf60-bVNd_2n3A]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/3ff3efd5x4eqh41/Rune-Hive.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAFC_Uj4VcX-QIucVxqzq3dDxgBLfMAruf60-bVNd_2n3A[/url]
A little info about Rune-Hive [/SIZE] [CODE]*Custom Home
*Zombie Minigame
*Drygore Weapons
*Off-Hand weapons
*Operational Daemonhein Dungeoneering
*Custom Bosses
*Custom Capes
*Achievment list for completionist cape
*Custom titles
*Bossing Contracts with cash rewards
*Prestige system with prestige skulls
*Tetsu armour
*Kalphite armour
*Multiple point systems
*Difficulty selection
*Right click to view stats
*Custom Elite rank for the more dedicated players
*more to list, join today to see for yourself![/CODE]
[SIZE=5]Current Staff list
Owner: Trent Admins: N/A (open to applications) Mods: N/A (open to applications)
Media:[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j472/ttgxtrent/dung.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j472/ttgxtrent/runespan.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j472/ttgxtrent/kjkjhjlkj/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j472/ttgxtrent/kjkjhjlkj/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j472/ttgxtrent/kjkjhjlkj/1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j472/ttgxtrent/kjkjhjlkj/3.png[/img][/CENTER]
